Class WorkspaceController

java.lang.Object
application.WorkspaceController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class WorkspaceController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller for the workspace interface of the Quirx application. Manages tasks, including adding, deleting, editing, and marking tasks as completed. Also handles UI logic for inviting friends and switching between panes.
